_88word.description: Transcript. JSON utterance (all word edges between 2 time nodes). Array of n objects describing each alternative word

_88page.description: The page on which the text or insight appears

_88noDocumentIndexing.description: Disable document indexing (page/paragraph/sentence) for the object

$eref.description: A point describing the 2d coordinates from the top left corner of the source.

___x.description: A floating point describing the location via percentage on the x axis (1.0 would be right of the axis)

___y.description: A floating point describing the location via percentage on the y axis (1.0 would be the bottom of the axis)

_88sentence.description: The sentence in which the text or insight appears. If paragraph is provided, it should be the sentence number within the paragraph (restart at 1 for each new paragraph). Otherwise it may be an increasing number for the whole document.

_88point.description: A point describing the 2d coordinates from the top left corner of the source.

___x.description: A floating point describing the location via percentage on the x axis (1.0 would be right of the axis)

___y.description: A floating point describing the location via percentage on the y axis (1.0 would be the bottom of the axis)

___startTimeMs.description: The start time relative to the start of the media asset in milliseconds.

___entityIdentifierId.description: The unique ID of recognized entity identifier (for example, a specific image). This information is not always available and is therefore optional.

___stopTimeMs.description: The stop time relative to the start of the media asset in milliseconds.

___assetId.description: The ID of the asset output by the engine

_88objectCategory.description: Optional categories for object recognition. Used for referencing external taxonomies.

___class.description: The class of the object recognized
___class.example: For example, if the label of an object was dog, the class of the object could be animal

$eref.description: Confidence of the result expressed as a range of 0.0 to 1.0

___@id.description: Private id variable used by the engine to refer to its internal dataset

_88objectText.description: The extracted textual content of a found object.

___startTimeMs.description: The start time relative to the start of the media asset in milliseconds.

___stopTimeMs.description: The stop time relative to the start of the media asset in milliseconds.

___sourceEngineName.description: Engine name used to generate output (provided by Veritone)

___externalSourceId.description: Vendor specific referenceId to this engine result (optional)

___generatedDateUTC.description: DateTime (ISO8601) of when the engine result was generated (provided by Veritone if not included)

___taskPayload.description: JSON key/value task payload describing the tasks used to start the engine run (provided by Veritone). Task payload will be a combination of attributes found on https://docs.veritone.com/#/developer/adapters/quick-start/step-2?id=constructing-a-batch-pull-adapter and any default custom fields (https://docs.veritone.com/#/developer/engines/custom-fields/?id=custom-fields)

$eref.description: Optional categories for object recognition. Used for referencing external taxonomies.

___class.description: The class of the object recognized
___class.example: For example, if the label of an object was dog, the class of the object could be animal

___@id.description: Private id variable used by the engine to refer to its internal dataset

___entityIdentifierId.description: The unique ID of recognized entity identifier (for example, a specific image). This information is not always available and is therefore optional.

Confidence of the result expressed as a range of 0.0 to 1.0
Number of consecutive time-slices the utterance spans. example: of->thrones----->of->their-->own-> utteranceLength: thrones: 2; their,own: 1
Transcript. JSON utterance (all word edges between 2 time nodes). Array of n objects describing each alternative word

_88utteranceLength.description: Number of consecutive time-slices the utterance spans. example: of->thrones----->of->their-->own-> utteranceLength: thrones: 2; their,own: 1

_88confidence.description: Confidence of the result expressed as a range of 0.0 to 1.0

_88paragraph.description: The paragraph in which the text or insight appears. If page is provided, it should be the paragraph number on the page (restart at 1 for each new page). Otherwise it may be an increasing number for the whole document.
